title: Invincible: Guarding the Globe Tier List
description: Comprehensive tier list of characters in Invincible: Guarding the Globe, categorized from S Tier to C Tier with detailed descriptions.
heading: Invincible: Guarding the Globe Tier List
introText: Comprehensive tier list of characters in Invincible: Guarding the Globe, categorized from S Tier to C Tier with detailed descriptions.

data.itemDescription: Incredibly strong and versatile attacker and great in any team and against all setups

Good damage dealer and can take a couple hits as well. Even as a new player without all skills you will like him a lot but once you have his 3rd skill he can crit chain like crazy and output so much damage. Not as versatile overall as Invincible but a character you will not regret building and running
Best support in Invincible Guardian the Globe. Useful in every team and every situation with his buffing and healing
Nice support and can do a lot espcially silencing enemies that really hurt your team is where he shines and makes your life a lot easier when you need that
Nice shielding make her very useful in pretty much all teams and along with the healing of her later skills a perfect support hero in Invincible GTG

The best ranged attacker in the game right now with a lot of extra traits that make sense and absolutely good to build - only the team building is a little slim right now since the faction heroes for most parts aren't the best right now but i am sure this will change and getting a few copies now is absolutely no problem in the long run
An attacker with impressive base stats and abilities, offering a balance of damage output and durability in battles
Pretty good DPS but not as op as Doc or Invincible
A reliable defender with damage reduction abilities and self-sustain, enhancing team defense against formidable foes
A dependable defender known for his straightforward tanking abilities, effectively absorbing damage to protect allies
Similar too Shrinking Rae quite too fragile to really make an impact
By far the most durable defender in Invincible Guarding the Globe! The kit is not funky, just straightforward and the stuns are great as well
Can be alright but there are a couple better damage dealers that are less fragile. Also, she needs all her skills and timing to be good to pop off
Since release thanks to more synergies and smaller adjustments have become quite a formidable tank with also some dmage in his kit
Really good support hero with stuns crowd control and her emergency healing and invisibility makes hard to deal with and a reliable support for your team
Not that she is a bad attacker but she needs quite some conditions be met to get her full potential and I always prefer more burst than DoT damage and there are already strong attackers in the game
Alright as early game attacker but will fall off after that
A support hero capable of removing enemy buffs and reducing debuff durations on allies, though outclassed by higher-tier supports
A strong attacker with area-of-effect damage capabilities and the durability to off-tank, making her versatile in various combat scenarios
If you have a Mauler team going or building, he is pretty good but overall doesn't fit in many meta teams right now
An attacker who can reduce enemy defenses, silence targets, and restore his own health, providing versatility in combat situations
An attacker with electrical abilities, capable of dealing sustained damage to multiple enemies simultaneously

Pretty decently balanced, not outstanding or anything and for sure not a character to break up your working teams. But if you're tempted to get him and are not too deep into the exsting teams so far, he is worth it
An attacker with mini stun debuffs and team health enhancements, offering strategic control during battles
Alright as early game attacker but will fall off after that
An attacker with area-of-effect damage and damage-over-time abilities, effective in controlling groups of enemies
A defender utilizing tendrils for battlefield control, excelling in manipulating enemy positions and strategies
A support character capable of stealing enemy buffs and conditionally increasing team health, though less impactful compared to top-tier supports
Can do some stuff in arena mode but overall not a hero to really think about all too much
Bad attacker, stay away and you can fodder him
Good defender as a rare hero and worth building early for multi-team setups in ops
Quite solid support as rare hero early in Invincible Guarding the Globe
Okay in the first days but honestly fodder hero
